directions: Stir together peanut butter, apple butter, and optional caramel sauce in a medium sized bowl.
Mix cinnamon into the graham cracker crumbs and add to the apple butter mixture. Combine well.
Scoop Tablespoon-sized balls of the mixture onto a wax paper-lined cookie sheets (dough will be soft). Roll into uniform-sized balls.
Place chopped peanuts in a small bowl and roll the balls in them to coat.
title: Peanut Butter Apple Bites
